CustomField.formula:
IF ( SBQQ__Account__r.Specific_Transportation__c=True, Tech_Region__c, IF ( OR( LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "75", LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "77", LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "78", LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "91", LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "92", LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "93", LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "94", LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "95" ) , "IDF" , IF ( LEFT(SBQQ__ShippingPostalCode__c,2) = "20" , "Corse" , "France")
) )
CustomField.label: Shipping Area
